alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Lincoln; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 8:34PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...LIGHT MIX OF RAIN AND FREEZING RAIN EXPECTED THIS EVENING AND OVERNIGHT... Light to occasionally moderate rain has developed and continues to lift northeast into portions of central and far northeast Wisconsin. Temperatures are hovering near to just above freezing, which has allowed some of the rain to freeze on untreated surfaces. The recent very cold temperatures has allowed some surfaces to remain below freezing, even as the air temperatures rise. This will lead to slippery travel at times through much of the night. If traveling tonight, prepare for rapidly changing conditions and some slippery conditions at times.

area.areaDesc: Langlade; Lincoln; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County
